title: 1000000% proof that Riot doesn't care about inting

embed.description: TURN ON ANNOTATIONS I disabled comments because I was sick of getting several e-mails a day that all said one of the same three things: "LOL FEEDER", "TURN OFF YOUR FUCKING SKYPE", or "HOW MANY KILLS DID CHOGATH GET?".

body: This should never happen. I bet this player is still joining matches and causing this level of mayhem to this day. Rito plz

replies.body:
https://i.gyazo.com/1d40872797f659a0dd28a9fa08cc889e.png

Your average ADC KDA in Bronze
"I WAS A YORICK MAIN HE DIDNT NEED REWORKED!"

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BdgYYTlM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-25T03:07:56.283+0000)
>
> How old is this clip?

Does it matter? 289 deaths is never okay

> [{quoted}](name=AnAggravatedPimp,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BdgYYTlM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-08-25T05:08:57.450+0000)
>
> Does it matter? 289 deaths is never okay

Which is why it probably hasn't happened in 7 years.
Now hold on there a *checks boards thread was posted to* checks out +1

> [{quoted}](name=AnAggravatedPimp,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BdgYYTlM,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-08-25T01:36:49.494+0000)
>
> This should never happen. I bet this player is still joining matches and causing this level of mayhem to this day. Rito plz

This was a bug on Yorick which allowed him to live, but had 1 hp and he would be unkillable (kind of) and just do whatever he wants.

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BdgYYTlM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-30T18:02:28.531+0000)
>
> This was a bug on Yorick which allowed him to live, but had 1 hp and he would be unkillable (kind of) and just do whatever he wants.

"posted in memes & games"

I'm no fan of Riot, but in the interests of fairness, this isn't even 1% _proof_ of anything. You _betting_ on something isn't _proof_, it's conjecture.

(Yes, I am aware this is a meme post. My humor is dry.)
